title: The New Client Glitches and Bugs
body: so i have two twenty minute bans and i got into a game when it was done and then it glitched and i couldnt press anything. so now i had to wait 5 min and another 20 min and it does this every single time i get bans for leaving like the last 15 min when we are about to almost do baron and finish

replies.body: It sounds like you have an escalated [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ), and I'd like to help get this figured out.  It seems like you have an unstable connection that's causing you a series of issues from dysyncing during champ select to totally d/c'ing in-game.  My recommendation for your case would be to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  It should help resolve whatever is cutting you off from our services.  Let me know if you have any questions!
